title: Community Hours
description: Join us on Wednesdays and Thursdays, from 11:00am-4:00pm, during our regular community hours at IR. The space is open for work, meetings, and intimate weekday programs. WiFi, a growing book collection, and tea are all provided. No RSVP required, stop by and say hi!

additional_sections.title: Special Programs
additional_sections.content:
Throughout the year, we also host special community programs and events. Check our calendar page for upcoming special community hour events and programming.

Community hour programs include artist talks, book discussions, skill-sharing workshops, and other informal gatherings designed to foster connection and exchange within our community.
